summary.span: 表示含有 3 个组件的值元组。

span.span: Represents a value tuple with 3 components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值元组是具有特定数量和值序列的数据结构。A value tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 结构表示具有三个元素的值元组。The structure represents a value tuple that has three elements. 值元组类型不同于元组类型 (如 ) ，如下所示：The value tuple types differ from the tuple types (such as ) as follows: - 它们 (值类型的结构，而不是) (引用类型) 的类。They are structures (value types) rather than classes (reference types). - 成员（例如 和） 是字段而不是属性。Members such as and are fields rather than properties. - 它们的字段是可变的，而不是只读的。Their fields are mutable rather than read-only. 值元组类型提供支持 c # 中的 [元组](/dotnet/csharp/tuples) 和 F # 中的结构元组的运行时实现。The value tuple types provide the runtime implementation that supports [tuples in C#](/dotnet/csharp/tuples) and struct tuples in F#. 除了 使用语言语法创建实例外，还可以调用 工厂方法。In addition to creating a instance by using language syntax, you can call the factory method. ### 序列化和值元组Serialization and value tuples 该 类型在 .Net Core 1.x 或 .NET Framework 4.7 及更早版本中不可序列化。The type is not serializable in .NET Core 1.x or in the .NET Framework 4.7 and earlier versions. 此外，.NET Standard （包括 .NET Standard 2.0）不会强制 对实例进行序列化; 是否 可序列化实例取决于单个 .NET Standard 实现。In addition, .NET Standard, including .NET Standard 2.0, does not mandate serialization of instances; whether or not a instance is serializable depends on the individual .NET Standard implementation. 若要确定某一 类型在特定 .net 实现上是否可序列化，请获取一个 对象，该对象表示 类型并检索其属性的值 。To determine whether a type is serializable on a particular .NET implementation, get a object that represents the type and retrieve the value of its property. 有关 .NET Core 和 .NET Framework 中的可序列化类型的列表，请参见 [二进制序列化](/dotnet/standard/serialization/binary-serialization)。For a list of serializable types in .NET Core and the .NET Framework, see [Binary Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/binary-serialization).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`在下列条件下，参数被视为等于当前实例：The `obj` argument is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是 值类型。It is a value type. - 其组件的类型与当前实例的组件相同。Its components are of the same types as those of the current instance. - 其组件等于当前实例的组件。Its components are equal to those of the current instance. 相等性取决于每个组件的默认相等比较器。Equality is determined by the default equality comparer for each component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的字符串采用格式 ( *Item1* ， *Item2* ， *Item3* ，其中 *Item1* 、 *Item2* 和 *Item3* 表示 、 和字段的值 。The string returned by this method takes the form ( *Item1* , *Item2* , *Item3* , where *Item1* , *Item2* , and *Item3* represent the values of the , , and fields. 如果任何字段值为，则将 `null` 其表示为 。If any of the field values is `null`, it is represented as .
